summary:
A mod that contains a remanaged version of the weapons, armours and shields of Skyrim.
Full list of tweaks included.
descriptionHtml:
Leveled Items not changed
Unique Items only

In the case of any glitches and/or catastrophes pm me

One of the things that annoyed me the most about vanilla skyrim was the fact that unique weapons or armor were always so weak, for example, wuuthrad was basically an iron war axe and the targe of the bloodied was a joke. That is why i decided to make this mod which basically boosts the combat capabilities of every non-leveled unique weapon.

[color=blue]Items Changed[/color]
-blade of woe
-keening
-nettlebane
-ghostblade
-rueful axe
-wuuthrad
-headsmans axe
-aegisbane
-trollsbane
-finriel\'s end
-targe of the blooded
-shield of ysgramor
-helm of yngol

[color=green]BEGINNING OF CHANGES-MADE LIST:[/color]

!!!WEAPONS!!!(Item Subcategory)

:blade of woe(Item being changed)
Weight (characteristic of item being changed)
-7 kg->5kg(change made)
Ench.(next characteristic of item being changed)
 -base charge 500->1000(500 enchantment charges to 1000)
 -type absorb health 03->05(enchantment level intensified)

-500->750

-1.00->1.05
